overview: Adapted from the famous horror novel of the same name by author Thao Trang. One night at the end of the year, Mr. Thap - the village chief and also the only one who can safely descend the mountain - was told in a dream by three snakes that Hell Village was about to encounter great disaster. Terrible things happened in succession, causing people to experience a haunting and terrifying Tet season. From a place of indignation, they began to turn to suspicion and turn against each other. Who is behind all this crime? Will the nightmare in Hell's Village be over, or will this place be engulfed in the fate that it's called?
title: Tết Ở Làng Địa Ngục
